thread.section_title: Novotel Suites Paris Stade de France - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Saint-Denis) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Spacious rooms for the sports lover
thread.title_full: Spacious rooms for the sports lover - Review of Novotel Suites Paris Stade de France, Saint-Denis, France - TripAdvisor

author: Stephanie070
title: Spacious rooms for the sports lover
text: Great sized rooms for those visiting Paris or the Stade de France, which is situated the opposite side of the road. Less than 10 minute walk from train station with direct links to central Paris and CDG airport. The room had good facilities for a DIY holiday - microwave, fridge, coffee facilities, Large television, bath & shower. Staff very helpful. Breakfast was fine.
